channel.title: Walk (Move Slowly) doesn't work.
channel.description: I can't get the Walk (Move Slowly) command to work. I've tried assigning CTRL and ALT but no effect. However, crouch also slows down walking which compensates. B)

item.title: Walk (Move Slowly) doesn't work.
item.dc:creator: Syex
item.description:
Yes, I already had de-activated ‘always run’. What do you mean when you say you can run with shift and can’t walk? Wait a minute, there are 3 speeds… aren’t there? :what:

Read full topic

item.title: Walk (Move Slowly) doesn't work.
item.dc:creator: javiersource
item.description:
You can only walk when you activate “always run” in Options, in the same way, SHIFT for running will not work. When you deactivate that option, you can run with SHIFT, and can’t walk

Read full topic

item.title: Walk (Move Slowly) doesn't work.

item.description:
I can’t get the Walk (Move Slowly) command to work. I’ve tried assigning CTRL and ALT but no effect. However, crouch also slows down walking which compensates. B)
